title: Serena Williams, Andy Murray confirmed for Hopman Cup
text: Serena Williams, Andy Murray confirmed for Hopman Cup Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) PERTH, Australia (AP) " Top-ranked Serena Williams will combine with Jack Sock once again when she opens her 2016 tennis season at the Hopman Cup tournament in January.Williams, who won the event in 2003 with James Blake and in...
